metadata.subject: Career development
Youth
metadata.title: Teens and careers : a parent's guide
metadata.creator: Alberta. Alberta Advanced Education and Career Development. Information Development and Marketing Branch
metadata.publisher: Edmonton, AB : Alberta Advanced Education and Career Development, Information Development and Marketing Branch
metadata.description: Guide for adults who want to help teenagers make good education and career decisions, providing information, exercises, and suggestions along with ideas for further information

The booklet covers trends and future jobs; living with teens and how to help them do well; exercises and checklists to help teens discover their interests, work values, and skills; how to translate skills and interests into occupations and how to gain experience; and post-secondary options and the importance of life-long learning
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No title page found.
